titles.title: A resolution commending the Clemson University Tigers men's golf team for winning the 2003 National Collegiate Athletic Association Division I Men's Golf Championship.
A resolution commending the Clemson University Tigers men's golf team for winning the 2003 National Collegiate Athletic Association Division I Men's Golf Championship.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced on June 5, 2003. The summary has been expanded because action occurred on the measure.)Commends the Clemson University Tigers for winning the 2003 National Collegiate Athletic Association Division I Men's Golf Championship. Invites the team to the U.S. Capitol Building to be honored.
